1370: Paradanus moved to Die Camp.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Liudburgis at age 19 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Liudburgis, Nellen, at age 21.
1373: Had a son with Liudburgis, Brame, at age 22.
1374: Had a daughter with Liudburgis, Riet, at age 23.
1375: Had a daughter with Liudburgis, Gisele, at age 24.
1378: Had a daughter with Liudburgis, Amelgeir, at age 27.
1382: Lost his wife Liudburgis while she was giving birth to Cofte in 1382.
Became caretaker of Nellen, Brame, Riet, Gisele, Amelgeir, Cofte at age 32.
1389: Lost daughter Nellen when Nellen was 18 years old.
